desc.initial: Use the email ending in sk.ac.th

accountNotFound.title: Account not found
accountNotFound.desc: There might be a problem with your account. If you are a current student, please report this issue via <0>this form</0>.

dialog.gsiUnavailable: You are in a dev environment. To log in, copy over your Google credential string from your host machine and paste it here.
